jrunner.changelog: V3.1.5: - Added: Improved updater - Added: xFlasher can now check CB - Added: Alert when a bad block in a critical area is detected - Fixed: SVF/XSVF file open bug - Fixed: RGH3 image creation bugs - Fixed: XDKbuild image creation bugs - Fixed: Various bugs and usability issues - Fixed: Bug causing XDKbuild Trinity BB images to fail - Changed: Preparing the platform for future updates - Changed: Updater now requires TLS1.2
